Package entity.tower

Class Princess

java.lang.Object
entity.tower.Tower
entity.tower.Princess
public class Princess extends Tower
The `Princess` class represents a tower of type "Princess". It extends the `Tower` class and includes specific implementations for the `attack()` and `performUltimate()` methods.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Princess(int x, int y, int id)
    Constructs a `Princess` tower with the specified position and ID.

      public Princess(int x, int y, int id)
      Constructs a `Princess` tower with the specified position and ID.
      Parameters:
      x - the x position of the tower (pixel)

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Get the name of this tower.
      Specified by:
      getName in class Tower
      Returns:
      the name of the tower ("Princess")

    • attack

      public void attack(ProjectileManager pm, Enemy e)
      Perform an attack on the selected enemy. Creates a new projectile to attack the enemy and, if the tower's tier is at least 2 and the ultimate cooldown is over, performs the tower's ultimate ability.
      Specified by:
      attack in class Tower
      Parameters:
      pm - the projectile manager
      e - the enemy to attack

    • performUltimate

      public void performUltimate(ProjectileManager pm, Enemy e)
      Perform the tower's ultimate ability. Activates the princess's ultimate ability by calling the `princessUltimate()` method of the projectile manager.
      Specified by:
      performUltimate in class Tower
      Parameters:
      pm - the projectile manager
      e - the enemy to target with the ultimate
